Jason Edwards ( 1969 â€“ 14 March 2022) was an Australian professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s. He played for the Newcastle Knights from 1991 to 1992. He played for Country Origin in 1990. Edwards died on 14 March 2022, at the age of 52.
